name: Fort Zombie Redux (2018)
description:
The Zombies are attacking! Construct walls and plant bombs to protect yourself from oncoming waves of zombies! Follow the story of Charlie and the secrets of their past as you fight for your life in Fort Zombie Redux!

Play in three different modes of varying difficulty, fight two bosses on two special stages, and create your own levels to play on using the FZ Level Creator! Initially released a few years prior, FZR has been touched up and expanded on for a 2018 Edition Release by LantixPro Studios!

Will you reach the ending and unlock the secrets of Charlie and the Zombies?
We hope you enjoy the game and appreciate any helpful feedback or suggestions you may have. Thanks for taking the time to check out our game!
